ratings.comment: Roberto genuinely cares not just about his student's grades, but their lives as well. He puts in the effort to get to know his students and is incredibly understanding if a student misses an assignment. He is super funny and engaging and since I took a class later at night, this was super helpful. Take a class with him if you get the chance!

Roberto is genuinely been one of my favorite professors. He is kind and considerate and really makes an effort to make sure his students understand the material and are learning. I never dread class because I know he will make it entertaining and brighten our day with a joke or just himself laughing. Couldn't have gotten a better Spanish teacher.
Wonderful professor who honestly cares if you succeed in the class. Would take time out of his incredibly busy schedule to help you personally or the class as a whole

I cannot speak highly enough about Roberto! He effectively created a welcoming learning environment and undoubtedly cared about student success/confidence with the course. I was so sad when the semester came to an end - it was such a joy having him as part of my Spanish speaking journey.

One of the best professors I've had so far. All around great guy and tries his hardest to get everyone engaged in his class. He really does care about all of his students and wants to see everyone do well and it really shows. I have never rated a professor before but this review just goes to show you how amazing this man really is. 10000/10
He was one of the best professors I've ever had.

Cares a lot about participation. Though, this isn't hard since he creates such a welcoming environment. The class is run a lot like a normal high school class. Makes the hour and a half go by very fast. He genuinely wants everyone to do well.
Absolutely loved this class! He is an amazing teacher that finds a way to make everyone feel like they're doing well. Always very supportive and prepared us well for exams.
I loved this class! Roberto is such a good professor - he's super understanding and funny. In 226 you have no exams but it is pretty heavy with writing because it is a writing class after all.

Roberto is one of the best teachers I have ever had. Roberto's lectures are entertaining and fun to go to. While he is one of the funniest teachers I have ever had, I also feel like I really improved my Spanish after taking his class. The work load for 223 was not bad at all, and he was also not a very tough grader. I strongly recommend Roberto

Roberto is one of the best TAs I've had. He encourages discussion and is willing to hear all sides of someone's opinion. He makes sure he is available outside of class in case students need anything inside or outside of the classroom. I always felt welcome in his class. He is very funny and keeps class engaging. Would absolutely recommend Roberto.

One of the best professors I've ever had, not only for Spanish courses, but in general. Truly is what I wish I could have in every professor. I plan to choose future Spanish courses that he specifically teaches! Take him if you have the opportunity.

Roberto is super nice, funny, and genuinely wants students to succeed. Class was always fun and engaging! Fair grader and is very approachable and easy to connect with outside of class in order to get help with the course material. He makes Spanish easy to practice and understand. The course itself does have a lot of busy work though.

Roberto is hilarious and really loves his students. His classes are fun and have a lot of variety so you won't get bored. He really appreciates and uses students feedback. All and all I learned a lot from his class and had a good time too.

Roberto shows his passion about teaching from day 1. I was used to big lectures where the professors don't know/care about their students. He always listens to his students. He makes class a great place where everyone can learn. He is funny, dedicated and very inspirational. He understands you and that is very important. I highly recommend Roberto
Roberto is FANTASTIC! 10/10 do recommend. One of the best Spanish Profs I have ever had

Roberto makes learning Spanish enjoyable and is very fluent and knowledgable about the language since he is from Spain. Lots of discussion involved, but as long as you talk a little and try to understand, he will give you the participation points. Also, he's super hot, funny, and treats you more as a friend than as a student
